directions: Gently mix tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, 1/4 teaspoon chopped basil, and oregano together in a large bowl; top with feta cheese. Pour Greek dressing over salad and season with black pepper. Garnish salad with a sprig of fresh basil.
ingredients: 1 (16 fl oz) bottle Greek salad dressing
title: Greek Tomato Salad
